Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.20497921 0.01853141 0.18215939 0.30173671 0.91352182 0.02687214
#>  [7] 0.99506009 0.89772552 0.81722016 0.83026495 0.58405158 0.49035105
#> [13] 0.84901692 0.14131925 0.34509608 0.05161689 0.53829645 0.90127296
#> [19] 0.88888718 0.86758305
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.93493730 0.25274679 0.26999153 0.89111702 0.55640481 0.08530768
#>  [7] 0.51896077 0.96841696 0.95195208 0.69036330 0.09754303 0.65909461
#> [13] 0.66676046 0.53046824 0.58188919 0.87830818 0.44345916 0.53164903
#> [19] 0.60394131 0.04281444

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.2016621 0.1823019 0.5871358 0.5631846 0.7814921 0.1446238 0.6987521
#>  [8] 0.2939604 0.6720543 0.6164988
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.081343964 0.912810286 0.003199263 0.903812830 0.754398644 0.194309921
#>  [7] 0.231915569 0.106698817 0.085231172 0.893178563
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.3928819 0.6478736 0.3390614 0.4139472 0.8259406 0.4072328 0.5445902
#>  [8] 0.4634769 0.3489651 0.1441523

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.53599244 0.53267998 0.04881756 0.69073167 0.77271393
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.3476991 0.7723977 0.3087666 0.6858597 0.0575078
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.70543247 0.89372820 0.13968791 0.40958864 0.07430722
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.7027314 0.8081960 0.1766883 0.5844341 0.5601302

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.2916318 0.4243948 0.4071063 0.2445888 0.0317610
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.5805910 0.3227296 0.5861096 0.9871512 0.3436152
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.6521097 0.3945221 0.4991237 0.7522037 0.3238260
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.765160332 0.005755286 0.429309538 0.787931117 0.589141664

mclapply

(ncores <- parallel::detectCores())
#> [1] 2
stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(parallel::mclapply, X=1:4, mc.cores = pmin(1,ncores-1))
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.3737740 0.1761963 0.0789218 0.8364813 0.4132472
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.36608905 0.15373504 0.04646685 0.86613225 0.34065075
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.4850867 0.5832805 0.4024377 0.4474562 0.5780238
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.6891513 0.8119458 0.4349259 0.4227976 0.9057103

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.0         3.2          4.7         1.4 versicolor
#> 2          4.6         3.6          1.0         0.2     setosa
#> 3          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 4          6.2         2.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 5          4.8         3.4          1.6         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          4.4         2.9          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 2          5.6         2.9          3.6         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          5.2         3.5          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 4          6.7         3.1          4.4         1.4 versicolor
#> 5          5.3         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.7         3.0          6.1         2.3  virginica
#> 2          5.1         3.8          1.6         0.2     setosa
#> 3          6.4         2.8          5.6         2.2  virginica
#> 4          6.9         3.1          4.9         1.5 versicolor
#> 5          6.3         3.3          4.7         1.6 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.5         3.0
#> 2           6.4         3.2
#> 3           6.7         3.3
#> 4           5.9         3.0
#> 5           5.7         3.8
#> 6           6.9         3.1
#> 7           5.4         3.9
#> 8           6.0         3.0
#> 9           6.1         2.8
#> 10          4.8         3.0
#> 11          5.9         3.2
#> 12          5.0         3.0
#> 13          5.4         3.0
#> 14          6.0         3.4
#> 15          5.2         2.7
#> 16          5.5         2.5
#> 17          5.5         2.3
#> 18          7.9         3.8
#> 19          5.6         2.9
#> 20          5.4         3.9

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.6         2.7
#> 2          5.8         2.7
#> 3          5.6         3.0
#> 4          6.6         3.0
#> 5          6.5         3.0
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.9         3.2
#> 2          5.5         2.3
#> 3          5.0         3.5
#> 4          6.2         2.8
#> 5          6.3         3.3
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          7.9         3.8
#> 2          5.0         3.4
#> 3          6.5         3.0
#> 4          7.7         2.8
#> 5          5.1         2.5
